constraints.name: system_composed_of_operators
constraints.notes: System is composed of deterministic, measurable operators | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): ∀ component ∈ System : typeof(component) = Operator

constraints.name: two_tracts_exist
constraints.notes: Exactly two tracts: External and Internal | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): |{T_ext, T_int}| = 2

constraints.name: t_ext_definition
constraints.notes: External Tract is a pipeline of Interface Operators | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): T_ext = pipeline(InterfaceOperators)

constraints.name: t_int_definition
constraints.notes: Internal Tract is a pipeline of Intelligence Operators | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): T_int = pipeline(IntelligenceOperators)

constraints.name: agents_outside_tracts
constraints.notes: Agents are UX layer, not part of either tract | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): ∀ agent ∈ Agents : agent ∉ T_ext ∧ agent ∉ T_int

constraints.name: agents_call_corpus_callosum
constraints.notes: All agents interact with system via Corpus Callosum | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): ∀ agent ∈ Agents : calls(agent, C_c)

constraints.name: c_c_orchestrates_operators
constraints.notes: Corpus Callosum orchestrates both operator pipelines | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): orchestrates(C_c, T_ext) ∧ orchestrates(C_c, T_int)

constraints.name: operator_has_contract
constraints.notes: Each operator has a clear contract | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): ∀ op ∈ Operators : has_field(op, 'contract')

constraints.name: operator_has_budget
constraints.notes: Each operator has a resource budget | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): ∀ op ∈ Operators : has_field(op, 'budget')

constraints.name: operator_has_telemetry
constraints.notes: Each operator emits telemetry (latency, cost, Ψ) | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): ∀ op ∈ Operators : has_field(op, 'telemetry')

constraints.name: operators_deterministic
constraints.notes: All operators are deterministic | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): ∀ op ∈ Operators : deterministic(op)

constraints.name: operators_measurable
constraints.notes: All operators have measurable performance | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): ∀ op ∈ Operators : measurable(op)

constraints.name: operators_horizontally_scalable
constraints.notes: Operators can scale horizontally in distributed lattice | UNTRANSPILABLE (Phase8): ∀ op ∈ Operators : scalable(op, 'horizontal')
